Cards Against Humanity Settings Play Game How To Play \"Dirty\" Deck \"Clean\" Deck Create Game In an attempt to reach a wider audience, the Smithsonian Museum of Natural History has opened an interactive exhibit on _____ Choose the number of players Choose the maximum number of Awesome Points Full, uncensored card deck. Must be 18+. No profane cards. Fun for all ages! Please select your Deck Number of Players Maximum Awesome Points Main Menu How To Play Version Selection Game Setup <<<<<<< HEAD White Card Text Goes Here ======= 1. To start the game, each player draws ten White Cards. 2. Player 1 goes first. The order is determined by the players. 3. Everyone else answers the question by passing one or two white cards, face down, to the Card Czar. 4. The Card Czar will shuffle all of the answers and shares each card combination with the group. For full effect re-read the Black Card before presenting each answer. 5. The Card Czar will then select the funniest cards and whomever submitted the card receives an Awesome Point! 6. After the round, a new player becomes the Card Czar, and everyone draws back up to ten White Cards. 7. Some black cards require the players to pick 2 white cards: A. To answer these, each player plays two White Cards in combination. B. The cards must be played in the order the Card Czar should read them.
>>>>>>> origin/master
